headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Main content, descriptions, long form text.

mono.usage: Data points, scores, code snippets, ATS keywords.

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - The grounding force.

grids.bento_item: relative overflow-hidden border border-primary/10 bg-white p-6 md:p-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-none px-8 py-6 font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-sm shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#CCFF00] hover:translate-x-[-2px] hover:translate-y-[-2px] hover:shadow-[6px_6px_0px_0px_#CCFF00] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-none px-8 py-6 font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-sm transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-primary/5 text-primary rounded-none px-4 py-2 font-medium

inputs.base: rounded-none border-2 border-primary/10 bg-white px-4 py-3 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 font-mono text-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Outfit', 'Manrope', and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors (Deep Forest, Electric Lime) and border radius (0px).
3. SHADCN OVERRIDE: When using Shadcn components, strip the 'rounded-md' classes and replace with 'rounded-none'. Add the custom shadow styles.
4. LAYOUT STRATEGY: Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page. Don't just stack sections. Overlap them slightly using negative margins if needed for the 'Anti-AI' look.
5. DASHBOARD VISUALS: Use 'Recharts' for the analytics. Style the charts to match the palette (Green/Lime/Orange). No default blue charts.
6. AUTH FLOW: Customize the Google Auth button. Don't use the default white/blue pill. Make it fit the 'Professional Zen' theme (e.g., Black button with white logo).
7. SKILL GAP ANALYSIS: This is the core feature. Design this section with high contrast. Matched skills = Green pill, Missing = Orange outline pill.
8. USE SONNER: Replace any default toast with Sonner.
9. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless specified (use solid colors or subtle noise).
Avoid 'Inter' font. Use the specified font stack.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Use 'gap-8' or 'gap-12' for layout spacing to create breathing room.
Micro-interactions are mandatory for all buttons and cards.
